channel.title: Architecture on Eclipse Hono
channel.description: Recent content in Architecture on Eclipse Hono

item.title: Component View
item.description: This page describes the high level components constituting an Eclipse Hono™ instance and their relations to each other.

item.title: Authentication/Authorization
item.description: This page describes how authentication and authorization of devices, consumers (back end applications) and system components works in Hono.
